data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of El Paraíso that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of El Paraíso, Honduras
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in El Paraíso, Honduras and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary: On average, 16 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in El Paraíso, Honduras.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, help the church in the state of El Paraíso to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 338,104 people in the state of El Paraíso who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Turk people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Over 4.3 percent of the people of El Paraíso are far from Jesus.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in El Paraíso, Honduras, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of El Paraíso who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."
